channel.title: Help please

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

Step 4: Add this with your commands:

Code:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pvpoff”)) {
try {
if(wildyoff == 0) {
wildyoff = 1;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Pvp mode is now off”;
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Pvp mode is already turned off”);
}
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pvpon”)) {
try {
if(wildyoff == 1) {
wildyoff = 0;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Pvp mode is now on”;
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Pvp mode is already turned on”);
}
}
Step 5: Declare these:

Code:
public static int wildyoff = 0;
public boolean wildyIsOff() {
if(wildyoff == 1){
return true;
}
return false;
}

^^ where do i add both of those?

Read full topic
